channel.title: Grid on ProcessMaker Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Grid on ProcessMaker Code Snippets

item.title: Disable Grid Column
item.description: Disable a grid column function disableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let gridRows = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (i = 1; i <= gridRows; i++) { $("#form\\[" + gridId + "\\]\\[" +i+ "\\]\\[" + gridColumnId + "\\]").attr("disabled", true); } }

item.title: Enable Grid Column
item.description: Enable a grid column function enableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let gridRows = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (i = 1; i <= gridRows; i++) { $("#form\\[" + gridId + "\\]\\[" +i+ "\\]\\[" + gridColumnId + "\\]").attr("disabled", false); } } function enableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let numberOfGrid = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (let index = 1; index <= numberOfGrid; index++) { $("#" + gridId).find("#"+ gridId +"-body").find("#form\\["+ gridId +"\\]\\[" + index + "\\]\\["+ gridColumnId +"\\]").prop("disabled", false); } }

item.title: Is Grid Column Empty?
item.description: Check if a Grid column is empty function isGridColumnEmpty (gridId, rowNo, columnNo) { if (!($("#" + gridId).getValue(rowNo, columnNo) != '')) { return [false, columnNo]; } return [true, columnNo]; }

item.title: Show Grid Column
item.description: Show a grid column function showGridColumn(gridId, index) { $("#" + gridId).showColumn(index); $("#" + gridId).enableValidation(index); }

item.title: Hide Grid Column
item.description: Hide a grid column function hideGridColumn(gridId, index) { $("#" + gridId).hideColumn(index); $("#" + gridId).disableValidation(index); }

item.title: Clear Grid
item.description: Clear a grid function clearGrid(gridId) { return $("#" + gridId ).clear(); }

item.title: Disable Grid
item.description: Disable a grid function disableGrid(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).find("input,button,textarea,select").attr("disabled", true); }
